projects.name: Facebook Clone
projects.technologiesUsed: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, REST API, SocketIO, MongoDB, Mongoose, Hashing (for password security)
projects.description: A full-stack web application replicating the core features of the Facebook website using ReactJS, NodeJS, SocketIO, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, REST API, and Hashing.

projects.name: SUB-ZZA Pizza Delivery
projects.technologiesUsed: ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, REST API, SocketIO, MongoDB, Mongoose, Hashing (for password security)
projects.description: SUB-ZZA Pizza Delivery is an online pizza ordering and delivery platform designed to provide users with a seamless and enjoyable experience. It incorporates modern web technologies to facilitate easy navigation, secure user authentication, and efficient order processing.

projects.name: Resume Generator
projects.description: The Resume Generator is a modern web application built using React.js designed to simplify the resume creation process. It allows users to create professional resumes effortlessly with customizable templates and a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.technologiesUsed: Machine Learning, Python, Jupyter Notebook, NumPy, Pandas, NLTK, Scikit-learn, Requests, Streamlit, dotenv
projects.description: This project is a movie recommendation system developed using Python and Machine Learning. It utilizes the power of various libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, NLTK, Scikit-learn, and more. The recommendation system is built on a dataset available in the 'dataset' folder. Users are required to extract the files from the dataset folder and follow the instructions to run the system.

projects.name: VisionTube
projects.technologiesUsed: ReactJS, ReduxJS, React Router DOM, React Icons, Axios, Tailwind CSS, Autoprefixer, PostCSS, TypeScript
projects.description: VisionTube is a YouTube clone web application built using ReactJS. It aims to provide users with a familiar video streaming experience similar to YouTube, with features such as video search, watch functionality, and a home page showcasing trending videos.

projects.name: MelodyHub
projects.technologiesUsed: Next.js, React, React DOM, Framer Motion, mini-svg-data-uri, Simplex Noise, Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, TypeScript
projects.description: MelodyHub is a music academy website built with Next.js, providing a platform for music enthusiasts to explore courses, attend webinars, interact with instructors, and more.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Page
projects.technologiesUsed: Next.js, React, React DOM, Framer Motion, mini-svg-data-uri, Simplex Noise, Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, TypeScript
projects.description: This web application is built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It includes a responsive navigation bar, a hero section, a portfolio showcase, an about page, and a contact form.
